00026 int String2Int(const std::string& str)
00027 {
00028         int result = 0;
00029     std::string::const_iterator i = str.begin();
00030 
00031     if (i == str.end())
00032         return -999;
00033 
00034     bool negative = false;
00035 
00036     if (*i == '-')
00037     {
00038         negative = true;
00039         ++i;
00040 
00041         if (i == str.end())
00042             return -999;;
00043     }
00044 
00045     result = 0;
00046 
00047     for (; i != str.end(); ++i)
00048     {
00049         if (*i < '0' || *i > '9')
00050             return -999;;
00051 
00052         result *= 10;
00053         result += *i - '0';
00054     }
00055 
00056     if (negative)
00057     {
00058         result = -result;
00059     }
00060 
00061     return result;
00062 }

00101 void superkalkulator::Save(){
00102    ofstream outfile;
00103    outfile.open("Log.txt",ios::app);
00104    for(int i = 0;i<=Log.getTopStack()-1;i++)
00105    {
00106                 outfile << Log.getData(i) << endl;
00107    }
00108    outfile.close();
00109    cout<<"Save success"<<endl;
00110 }

00161 
00162         }

00284 void superkalkulator::Undo(int n){
00285         string out;
00286         if(n <= Log.getDataCount())
00287         {
00288                 int temp = Log.getDataCount();
00289                 for(int i = temp - n;i<=temp-1;i++)
00290                 {
00291                         cout<<"Pushed : "<<Log.getData(i)<<endl;
00292                         this->Log>>out;
00293                 }
00294         }
00295         else
00296         {
00297                 cout<<"Penghapusan gagal"<<endl;
00298         }
00299 
00300 }

00306 void superkalkulator::Redo(int n){
00307         if(n <= Log.getDataCount())
00308         {
00309                 int temp = Log.getDataCount();
00310                 for(int i = temp - n;i<=temp-1;i++)
00311                 {
00312                         this->Input(Log.getData(i));
00313                 }
00314         }
00315         else
00316         {
00317                 cout<<"Jumlah log lebih kecil dari yang diminta"<<endl;
00318         }
00319 
00320 }

00374 int superkalkulator::CheckEkspresiType(string ekspresi)
00375 {
00376         int mode;
00377         string tempekspresi = ekspresi;
00378         int Exit = 0;
00379         int ArabnLogika = 0;
00380         while(tempekspresi.length() != 0 && Exit==0)
00381         {
00382                 if(tempekspresi[0] == '~' || tempekspresi[0] == '&' || tempekspresi[0] == '|')
00383                 {
00384                         mode = 2;
00385                         Exit = 1;
00386                 }
00387                 else if(tempekspresi[0] == 'M' || tempekspresi[0] == 'D' || tempekspresi[0] == 'C' || tempekspresi[0] == 'L' || tempekspresi[0] == 'X'|| tempekspresi[0] == 'V'|| tempekspresi[0] == 'I')
00388                 {
00389                         mode = 3;
00390                         Exit = 1;
00391                 }
00392                 else if(tempekspresi[0] == '0' || tempekspresi[0] == '1')
00393                 {
00394                         if(tempekspresi.length() > 1)
00395                         {
00396                                 if(tempekspresi[1] == '0' || tempekspresi[1] == '1')
00397                                 {
00398                                         mode = 1;
00399                                 }
00400                                 else
00401                                 {
00402                                         mode = 0;
00403                                 }
00404                         }
00405                         else
00406                         {
00407                                 mode = 0;
00408                         }
00409                 }
00410                 else if( tempekspresi[0] == '2' || tempekspresi[0] == '3' || tempekspresi[0] == '4' || tempekspresi[0] == '5'
00411                         || tempekspresi[0] == '6'|| tempekspresi[0] == '7' || tempekspresi[0] == '8' || tempekspresi[0] == '9')
00412                 {
00413                         mode = 1;
00414                 }
00415                 tempekspresi.erase(0,1);
00416         }
00417         return mode;
00418 }
